title: Global bauxite import and export 2005 to 2018
summary: Overall Export is gradually increasing, Import is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Import, and lastly, 2. Export.
The minimum Trade in thousands metric tons about 29452.8, occured at 2009 by Export.
The greatest difference of Trade in thousands metric tons between Export and Import occurs at Year 2007 and the smallest difference occurs at 2010.
